value.title: New Contoso Sample app for Power BI Embedded

value.title: Power BI Drillthrough Updates
value.excerpt: Did you know there were Power BI drillthrough updates? In this video, Patrick looks at the drillthrough updates in Power BI Desktop. value.title: Power BI For Report Consumers
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at Power BI for report consumers. Those folks that maybe don't author reports, but just view reports within Power BI. value.title: Row-Level Security in Power BI - Revisited

value.title: STOP refreshing a single table at a time! (Power BI Desktop)
